.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SymDocument extends System.Object implements class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SymDocument extends System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymDocumentBase implements class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument, class System.IDisposable
Public Class SymDocument Inherits SymDocumentBase Implements IDisposable, ISymbolDocument
type SymDocument = class inherit SymDocumentBase interface ISymbolDocument interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示由符号存储引用的文档。

span.span: Represents a document referenced by a symbol store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档由 URL 和文档类型 GUID 定义。A document is defined by a URL and a document type GUID. 使用文档类型 GUID 和 URL，您可以找到文档。Using the document type GUID and the URL, you can locate the document. 您可以选择将文档源存储在符号存储区中。You can optionally store document source in the symbol store. 此接口还提供对该源的访问（如果存在）。This interface also provides access to that source, if present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，通过调用 方法获取此类型的实例，而不是使用此构造函数从非托管接口直接创建。Typically, instances of this type are obtained by calling the method, instead of being created directly from an unmanaged interface using this constructor.

summary.span: 在通过垃圾回收将 回收之前，释放非托管资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法;在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的 `Finalize` 方法，除非已通过调用 方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method.

span.span: The specified line in the document.

summary.span: 在当前文档中的一行不一定是序列点的情况下，返回最近的作为序列点的行的行号。

span.span: Returns the line number of the closest line that is a sequence point, given a line in the current document that might or might not be a sequence point.

returns.span: 与指定行距离最近的序列点的行号。

span.span: The line number of the closest sequence point to the specified line.
